author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2231](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2231): [TSG] cleanup of Scouting-related EndPaths.
  - [CMSHLT-2232](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2232): [BPH] update of BPH triggers for Run-3 tracking and update of `DoubleMuonLowMass` PrimaryDataset.
  - [CMSHLT-2237](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2237): [HIG] multijet+btags triggers using ParticleNet.
  - [CMSHLT-2239](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2239): [TSG] removal of unused PSets in HLT menus.

This update also includes a change of the default GT string to `None` (instead of an arbitrary old GT), in order to force users to update it properly.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X`
